name: apple_pie
description: A delicious pie made with apples
instructions: Peel, core, and slice the apples.
In a bowl, mix the apple slices with half of the sugar.
In another bowl, combine the flour and the remaining sugar.
Cut the butter into small pieces and blend it into the flour mixture until it forms a crumbly dough.
Divide the dough into two portions.
Press one portion into a pie dish to form the base crust.
Add the apple mixture over the base crust.
Crumble the remaining dough over the top of the apples.
Bake the pie in a preheated oven at 375°F (190°C) for 50-60 minutes or until golden brown.
